page.title: 06St.Mary's School Pantomime.
page.content: Every Christmas the children of {St.Mary's Primary School}take part in a pantomime.The songs take some aspect of the village and the people living there.Here is verse 1 and the chorus from the production of{'Aladdin'...... {Stansted had a football team {That nobody could beat, {And when we shouted up the blues {Our rivals felt the heat. {Nobody could stop us {As we fought for victory. {And soon we heard the whisper, {We'll go to Wembley. Chorus.... { We are the champions { We reach for the sky. { We are the champions { We have our banner high. { Stansted for Wembley we { Heard the crowds roar, { And we won the F.A.Vase in 1984.
